sentences.sContent: Umami enhancer improves feed intake of piglets mainly by stimulating their gustation, then promotes oral cavity and secretes hormones in the gastrointestinal tract to increase their feed intake.
sentences.sContent_eng: Umami enhancer improves feed intake of piglets mainly by stimulating their gustation, then promotes oral cavity and secretes hormones in the gastrointestinal tract to increase their feed intake.
sentences.sCn: 鲜味剂提高仔猪采食量的主要途径是通过刺激其味觉，从而促进口腔和胃肠道中的激素等分泌，以增加其对饲料的采食。

remMethod.val: 一阵强风(gust)吹来， 他们没办法在露天茶座惬意地进行美食品尝(gustation)了

trans.tranOther: the act of tasting or the faculty of taste
